Text: pliz help where is the key generator? i dont see it

Inside a subfolder.
Maybe your anti-virus blocked it.
Disable your anti-virus and browse the downloaded folder.

keygen worked for about one month...then application reverted to trial version. could not re-register with keygen.
yes, "check for updates" is unchecked/disabled.

perhaps modifying the host file would resolve this?

removed program. re-installed, blocked internet via firewall and disconnected from WLAN, re-applied crack...worked for ONE DAY...then, back to trial.

also tried 7.0.1.2022 ...no dice. 

anyone got a fix for this--aside from spending USD$59.95 ??
